name: Rat Pasty - Antibody Invasion
description:
"Be careful, Kruger. You're all we have left." Will you be able to fight through the swarm of aliens and destroy their nest? CONTROLS: WASD TO MOVE LMB TO SHOOT SHIFT TO SPEED UP CTRL TO SLOW DOWN (not like you'd want to)

It's the Year 2070 where the moon has become a home of unidentified alien organisms. These aliens have been sending out carnivorous creatures to try and expand their territories from the moon to other planets, and their first target is Planet Earth. Kruger, on a lone mission, must evade and shoot down the aliens in his path to make it to their spawner on the moon and destroy it.

Credits:

General Direction - Connor Eden.

Programming - William Bridgen, Ethan Munday, Charlie Cooper.

Art - Emery Derrington, Connor Eden.

Modelling - Ethan Munday, Emery Derrington, Henry (King Yin) Fung.

Story - Craig McGeachy, Muhammad Umar.

Music - Craig McGeachy.

 

This project is really bad considering we had 13 team members. We had some sick dialougue boxes that were never added into the game because of people.
